About

Howdy, I am Miguel Mota.

I specialize in HTML5/CSS3, Javascript(jQuery) and PHP/SQL. Currently I am a web developer for XTOPOLY, Inc. and at the same time attending Norco College getting my transter studies completed, to ultimately transfer to CSUF and major in computer science.

I am a 21 year old from the always sunny Southern California, with 3 years of experience in doing what I do. I love to code as much I love to watch videos of flying lawnmowers.
